Package com.sk89q.worldedit.bukkit

Class BukkitConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.sk89q.worldedit.LocalConfiguration
com.sk89q.worldedit.util.YAMLConfiguration
com.sk89q.worldedit.bukkit.BukkitConfiguration
public class BukkitConfiguration extends YAMLConfiguration
YAMLConfiguration but with setting for no op permissions and plugin root data folder.
